channel.title: Wave and current interaction on olaFlow | CFD for waves
channel.description: Recent content in Wave and current interaction on olaFlow | CFD for waves

item.title: Waves and currents are here
item.description: This is an old post saved for archival purposes only. The olaFoam project is now the olaFlow project Check this video out (best in 1080p): A 2D wave flume is set up with different wave conditions. From top to bottom you can see: waves only, current only, and simultaneous waves and current traveling in the same and in opposite directions. It is interesting to note the effects caused by wave and current interaction: variations in the velocity field and the Doppler effect affecting wave propagation.
